title: Shuma - new handwriting font from Tour De Force
content:
Shuma - I could say, so far our best handwriting font for small size texts. Readable with elegant monoline touch, Shuma comes in 3 weights: Light, Regular and Bold.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016205709im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Shuma_Poster_2_Typophile_4621.png)

[Shuma @ MyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016205709/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/tdf/shuma/)  
 [Shuma @ Type.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016205709/http:/www.type.co.uk/a_to_z_listing/supplier/65)  
 [Shuma @ Luth](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016205709/http:/www.luth.no/default.asp?side=fonter&Searchstring=Tour+De+Force)
author: tourdeforce
